text: @realDonaldTrump I don't think he intimated anything you dolt, he said plainly that it was ok to #TakeAKnee during the anthem. It's probably more respectful than your dumb hugs. Besides, you have COVID19, protests across the country, a recession and a hurricane going on right now. #TrumpIsAnIdiot
